meanings.definition: Affected with an ulcer or ulcers.
meanings.sent1: The ulcered skin needed special care.
meanings.sent2: Her ulcered foot was causing her pain.
meanings.sent3: The doctor joked that even the ulcered cat needed a bandage.
meanings.sent4: The city's ulcered infrastructure needed urgent attention.
meanings.sent5: The ulcered wound was a stark reminder of neglect.

meanings.sent1: The ulcered stomach made him uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The ulcered sores were painful to touch.
meanings.sent3: She found it funny that her ulcered toe needed a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent4: The ulcered landscape of the desert was a harsh sight.
meanings.sent5: The ulcered condition of the tree bark was alarming.
